titles.title: Strengthening Youth Apprenticeships Act of 2020
Strengthening Youth Apprenticeships Act of 2020
To direct the Secretary of Labor to award grants to eligible entities to carry out or expand youth apprenticeship programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Youth Apprenticeships Act of 2020
This bill requires (1) the Office of Apprenticeship within the Department of Labor to enter into an agreement with the Department of Education to promote the integration and alignment of apprenticeship programs with secondary, postsecondary, and adult education; and (2) Labor to award grants to eligible entities to create or expand youth apprenticeship programs.
